

[Information from SCB about SSYK](https://www.scb.se/contentassets/0c0089cc085a45d49c1dc83923ad933a/in-english-ssyk-2012.pdf):

Much the same as ISCO-88, ISCO-08 is a hierarchical classification on four
levels; 436 Unit groups comprise the most detailed level, which can be
aggregated into 130 Minor groups, into 43 Sub-major groups and 10 Major
groups.
